languages.text: На мостик поступило сообщение о появлении на борту покойного Вольного Торговца. Упомянуто имя Идиры Тласс, несанкционированного псайкера. Необходимо личное вмешательство Лорд-капитана для прояснения обстоятельств и устранения потенциальной опасности.

traits.locale_text: На мостик поступило сообщение о появлении на борту корабля покойного Вольного Торговца. В рапорте присутствует упоминание об Идире Тласс. Необходимо личное вмешательство Лорда-капитана для прояснения обстоятельств и устранения потенциальной опасности.

languages.text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.
languages.original_text: На мостик поступило сообщение о появлении на борту покойного Вольного Торговца. Упомянуто имя Идиры Тласс, несанкционированного псайкера. Необходимо личное вмешательство Лорд-капитана для прояснения обстоятельств и устранения потенциальной опасности.

traits.locale_text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralize the potential threat.

A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralize the potential threat.

A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralize the potential threat.

A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.

languages.text: 舰桥传来了消息，说早已过世的前任行商浪人出现在了船上。报告中还提到了伊迪拉·特拉斯这个名字，这是位未经授权的灵能者。领主舰长必须立刻采取行动，弄清楚发生了什么事情，消灭潜在的威胁。
languages.original_text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.

traits.locale_text: 舰桥传来了消息，说早已过世的前任行商浪人出现在了船上。报告中还提到了伊迪拉·特拉斯这个名字，这是位未经授权的灵能者。领主舰长必须立刻采取行动，弄清楚发生了什么事情，消灭潜在的威胁。

languages.text: 亡くなった自由開拓者が船に出現したとの報告がブリッジに届いた。非公式の異能者であるイディラ・トラスの名前が言及されたことで、ロード・キャプテンは何が起きているのかを突き止め、潜在的な脅威を無力化するために行動しなければならない。
languages.original_text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.

traits.locale_text: 亡くなった自由開拓者が船に出現したとの報告がブリッジに届いた。非公式の異能者であるイディラ・トラスの名前が言及されたことで、ロード・キャプテンは何が起きているのかを突き止め、潜在的な脅威を無力化するために行動しなければならない。

languages.text: El puente ha recibido un mensaje que informa de la presencia de la difunta Comerciante Independiente en la nave. El mensaje también menciona a Idira Tlass, una psíquica no autorizada. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe investigar la situación y neutralizar la posible amenaza.
languages.original_text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.

traits.locale_text: El puente ha recibido un mensaje que informa de la presencia de la difunta Comerciante Independiente en la nave. El mensaje también menciona a Idira Tlass, una psíquica no autorizada. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe investigar la situación y neutralizar la posible amenaza.

languages.text: Die Brücke hat eine Nachricht erhalten, wonach die verstorbene Freihändlerin auf dem Schiff gesehen wurde. Außerdem wurde eine unsanktionierte Psionikerin namens Idira Tlass erwähnt. Der Lord Captain muss herausfinden, was auf dem Schiff vor sich geht und die mögliche Bedrohung neutralisieren.
languages.original_text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.

traits.locale_text: Die Brücke hat eine Nachricht erhalten, wonach die verstorbene Freihändlerin auf dem Schiff gesehen wurde. Außerdem wurde eine unsanktionierte Psionikerin namens Idira Tlass erwähnt. Der Lord Captain muss herausfinden, was auf dem Schiff vor sich geht und die mögliche Bedrohung neutralisieren.

languages.text: La passerelle a reçu un message signalant l'apparition de l'ancienne libre-marchande dans le vaisseau. Le nom d'Idira Tlass, une psyker non assermentée, a été mentionné. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit intervenir pour découvrir ce qui se passe et neutraliser l'éventuelle menace.
languages.original_text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.

traits.locale_text: La passerelle a reçu un message signalant l'apparition de l'ancienne libre-marchande dans le vaisseau. Le nom d'Idira Tlass, une psyker non assermentée, a été mentionné. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit intervenir pour découvrir ce qui se passe et neutraliser l'éventuelle menace.

languages.text: Gemiden ayrılan Hür Tacir'in yeniden görüldüğü, bir mesajla köprüye bildirildi. Onaysız ruhsezer İdira Tlass isminden de söz edildi. Lord Kaptan, neler olduğunu anlamak için harekete geçmeli ve potansiyel tehdidi ortadan kaldırmalı.
languages.original_text: A message has come to the bridge reporting that the departed Rogue Trader has appeared on the ship. The name Idira Tlass was mentioned, an unsanctioned psyker. The Lord Captain must act to find out what is happening and to neutralise the potential threat.
